FC Slovácko|1. FC Synot Staré Město]] (youth) | managerclubs3 = [[Svit Zlín]] (youth) | managerclubs4 = Czech Republic U-16 (assistant) | managerclubs5 = Czech Republic U-18 (assistant) | managerclubs6 = Svit Zlín (assistant) | managerclubs7 = Czech Republic U-20 (assistant) | managerclubs8 = [[FC Tescoma Zlín]] | managerclubs9 = [[Czech Republic national under-19 football team|Czech Republic U-19]] (assistant) | managerclubs10 = [[FK Teplice]] | managerclubs11 = [[Czech Republic national under-21 football team|Czech Republic U-21]] (assistant) }} '''Vlastislav Mareček''' (15 April 1966 - 2 September 2007) was a [[Czechs|Czech]] [[association football|football]] coach. He was voted the best club coach of the [[Czech Republic]] in 2004/05 and 2005/06 seasons. During his career, he served as a coach of the junior national team, as well as of numerous Czech football clubs. In 2004-2006, he served as the head coach of [[FK Teplice]], before leaving this job due to the worsening disease. In September 2007, he died of [[leukemia]] in a [[Prague]] hospital.<ref>{{cite news|url=http://fotbal.idnes.cz/zemrel-fotbalovy-trener-marecek-dah-/fotbal.asp?c=A070902_160721_fotbal_rou|title=Zemřel fotbalový trenér Mareček|work=iDNES.cz|date=2 September 2007|accessdate=10 November 2012}}</ref> ==References== {{reflist}} {{FK Teplice managers}} {{Authority control|VIAF=85326830}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME =Marecek, Vlastislav | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Czech football manager | DATE OF BIRTH =15 April 1966 | PLACE OF BIRTH =[[Uherské Hradiště]], [[Czechoslovakia]] | DATE OF DEATH =2 September 2007 | PLACE OF DEATH =[[Prague]], [[Czech Republic]] }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Marecek, Vlastislav}} [[Category:Czech football managers]] [[Category:Gambrinus liga managers]] [[Category:FC Fastav Zlín managers]] [[Category:FK Teplice managers]] [[Category:1966 births]] [[Category:2007 deaths]] [[Category:People from Uherské Hradiště]] [[Category:Deaths from cancer]] {{CzechRepublic-footy-bio-stub}}
